text: Darkness and Light () is a 1999 Taiwanese drama film directed by Chang Tso- chi. It was screened in the Directors' Fortnight section of the 52nd Cannes Film Festival, and won the Grand Prix at the 12th Tokyo International Film Festival. ==Cast== *Lee Kang-i ...
